name: Speed Fall
description:
This game is meant to be a mobile  game (that's why everything looks so squashed in the middle) but  I don't have enough  money to get it onto the app store and advertise it so donations are much appreciated. This is the first game I've made  and it would be really great to hear your feedback on it so I can improve it. The game is a speedrunning game where you have to destroy tower blocks  to get your hexagon to the bottom as quickly as you can. There is a highscores page where you can see your fastest times on each of the 18 levels.  I hope to get this game out onto mobile devices soon so look out for it when it does!

Instagram:   https://www.instagram.com/joshstigzelius

Twitter:    https://twitter.com/joshstigzelius
